email_text:
Subject: Your Spotify Premium Renewal Confirmation - Invoice #987654321

Dear [Customer's Name],

We hope this email finds you well. We are writing to confirm the renewal of your Spotify Premium subscription for another month. Thank you for choosing to continue enjoying ad-free music streaming, offline listening, and exclusive content.

Here are the details of your recent transaction:
Invoice Number: 987654321
Subscription Plan: Spotify Premium
Renewal Date: [Date of Renewal]
Amount: $9.99

Billing Details:
Card Type: Visa
Card Number: XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-1234
Expiry Date: XX/XX
Billing Address: [Customer's Billing Address]

If you have any questions or concerns regarding your subscription or billing details, please feel free to reach out to our customer support team at support@spotify.com. We are here to assist you with any inquiries you may have.

Thank you for being a valued member of the Spotify community. We appreciate your continued support and look forward to providing you with the best music experience possible.

Warm regards,

Spotify Customer Support Team
